      • onColorChange

        protected abstract void onColorChange(javafx.scene.paint.Color mainColor,
                                      javafx.scene.paint.Color customColor)
        Will be called when either the main or the custom color changes. The initial values for both colors are Color.TRANSPARENT.
        Parameters:
        mainColor - The main color
        customColor - The custom color
